feed.title: 20 IT Industries (With Importance and Career Options)
feed.subtitle: Comprehensive overview of IT career paths, industry insights, and professional development opportunities

entry.title: What can I do with an IT degree
entry.summary: Explore the 5 best career paths for IT majors, including cybersecurity, software development, networking, IT management, and cloud computing. Learn about job responsibilities, salary expectations, and growth opportunities in each field.

entry.title: Cybersecurity Roles Explained
entry.summary: Understand the differences between Security Analysts, Engineers, Penetration Testers, and CISOs, and how each contributes to IT security. Discover the skills, certifications, and experience needed for each role.

entry.title: Breaking Into IT Careers
entry.summary: Tips for starting a career in IT and cybersecurity: certifications, internships, networking, and gaining hands-on experience. Learn about entry-level positions and how to build a strong foundation for career advancement.

entry.title: Government Cybersecurity Careers
entry.summary: Explore government cybersecurity positions, including roles at NSA, DHS, and the U.S. Cyber Command. Understand eligibility requirements, security clearances, required skills, and how to apply for federal cybersecurity positions.
